attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that this logo is poorly designed, visually incoherent and does not accurately represent either the British people or the 2012 Olympics.  We call on the Prime Minster to scrap this monstrosity in favour of a competition in which all UK citizens are invited to submit an original design of their own creation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
